page.title: 16Shopping.
page.content: we asked local people how often they shopped for groceries. 32.5% shop daily, 62.3% weekly, 2.8% fortnightly and 2.2% monthly. Choice of shopping place varied according to where they lived. 76% of Whickham shoppers and 55% of Sunniside ones use the four supermarkets in Whickham, 76% of Lobley Hill shoppers use supermarkets in Gateshead town centre while only l5.3% used Whickham - despite being nearer. A small number(l0%) of Whickham and Sunniside shoppers use hypermarkets at Washington or Stanley. Newcastle city centre is not seen as somewhere to buy food, but when asked about goods not bought locally, was the choice when buying clothes, shoes, furniture and household goods. Local shops however were valued, with newsagents and general stores being prized most.
